page.title: 16BEFORE WE GO TO SCHOOL
page.content: Frank gets up at six in the morning, William gets up at half past seven and Karen and Sarah get up at quarter to eight.We all get washed and put on our school uniforms. The girls wear grey skirts, white blouses and grey or red jumpers.The boys wear grey trousers, grey jumpers, grey or white shirts and red ties.Karen, Sarah and William have breakfast,but Frank takes his dog for a walk round the village first.Then we brush our teeth, pack our bags and get ready for school.William and Karen usually walk to school, it takes William 15 minutes and Karen about 10 minutes.Frank and Sarah go by car, it takes Sarah about 5 minutes and Frank 10 minutes.When we get to school we put our bags in the cloakroom.We play outside if the weather is fine until the bell goes at five minutes to nine.
